name: Under Pressure
description:
Executed in acrylic and pastel oil on canvas, this artwork presents a dreamlike vision of the chaos and existential pressure of the current consumer society. Their disconnected and sometimes mismatched movements translate into the paths we take in the course of our lives ... Encounters, mismatches, arrivals, departures, death and life.
The clash of who we are with what we intend to become.

If you buy this NFT, I send you the original artwork>
Send me a message on Twitter @marcuscorrea

Link to art gallery of artwork:
https://www.artmajeur.com/pt/marcuscorrea/artworks/14428328/under-pressure
